questionnaire.title: Portrait Values Questionnaire-Revised (PVQ-RR)
questionnaire.description: Here we briefly describe different people. Please read each description and think about how much that person is or is not like you. Rate each item using the 6-point scale.
questionnaire.instructions: Rate how much each person described is like you using the scale from 1 (Not like me at all) to 6 (Very much like me).

pvq_rr_en_q01.male: It is important to him to form his views independently.
pvq_rr_en_q01.female: It is important to her to form her views independently.
pvq_rr_en_q01.neutral: It is important to them to form their views independently.

pvq_rr_en_q02.male: It is important to him that his country is secure and stable.
pvq_rr_en_q02.female: It is important to her that her country is secure and stable.
pvq_rr_en_q02.neutral: It is important to them that their country is secure and stable.

pvq_rr_en_q03.male: It is important to him to have a good time.
pvq_rr_en_q03.female: It is important to her to have a good time.
pvq_rr_en_q03.neutral: It is important to them to have a good time.

pvq_rr_en_q04.male: It is important to him to avoid upsetting other people.
pvq_rr_en_q04.female: It is important to her to avoid upsetting other people.
pvq_rr_en_q04.neutral: It is important to them to avoid upsetting other people.

pvq_rr_en_q05.male: It is important to him that the weak and vulnerable in society be protected.
pvq_rr_en_q05.female: It is important to her that the weak and vulnerable in society be protected.
pvq_rr_en_q05.neutral: It is important to them that the weak and vulnerable in society be protected.

pvq_rr_en_q06.male: It is important to him that people do what he says they should.
pvq_rr_en_q06.female: It is important to her that people do what she says they should.
pvq_rr_en_q06.neutral: It is important to them that other people do what they say they should.

pvq_rr_en_q07.male: It is important to him never to think he deserves more than other people.
pvq_rr_en_q07.female: It is important to her never to think she deserves more than other people.
pvq_rr_en_q07.neutral: It is important to them never to think they deserve more than other people.

pvq_rr_en_q08.male: It is important to him to care for nature.
pvq_rr_en_q08.female: It is important to her to care for nature.
pvq_rr_en_q08.neutral: It is important to them to care for nature.

pvq_rr_en_q09.male: It is important to him that no one should ever shame him.
pvq_rr_en_q09.female: It is important to her that no one should ever shame her.
pvq_rr_en_q09.neutral: It is important to them that no one should ever shame them.

pvq_rr_en_q10.male: It is important to him always to look for different things to do.
pvq_rr_en_q10.female: It is important to her always to look for different things to do.
pvq_rr_en_q10.neutral: It is important to them always to look for different things to do.

pvq_rr_en_q11.male: It is important to him to take care of people he is close to.
pvq_rr_en_q11.female: It is important to her to take care of people she is close to.
pvq_rr_en_q11.neutral: It is important to them to take care of people they are close to.

pvq_rr_en_q12.male: It is important to him to have the power that money can bring.
pvq_rr_en_q12.female: It is important to her to have the power that money can bring.
pvq_rr_en_q12.neutral: It is important to them to have the power that money can bring.

pvq_rr_en_q13.male: It is very important to him to avoid disease and protect his health.
pvq_rr_en_q13.female: It is very important to her to avoid disease and protect her health.
pvq_rr_en_q13.neutral: It is very important to them to avoid disease and protect their health.

pvq_rr_en_q14.male: It is important to him to be tolerant toward all kinds of people and groups.
pvq_rr_en_q14.female: It is important to her to be tolerant toward all kinds of people and groups.
pvq_rr_en_q14.neutral: It is important to them to be tolerant toward all kinds of people and groups.

pvq_rr_en_q15.male: It is important to him never to violate rules or regulations.
pvq_rr_en_q15.female: It is important to her never to violate rules or regulations.
pvq_rr_en_q15.neutral: It is important to them never to violate rules or regulations.

pvq_rr_en_q16.male: It is important to him to make his own decisions about his life.
pvq_rr_en_q16.female: It is important to her to make her own decisions about her life.
pvq_rr_en_q16.neutral: It is important to them to make their own decisions about their life.

pvq_rr_en_q17.male: It is important to him to have ambitions in life.
pvq_rr_en_q17.female: It is important to her to have ambitions in life.
pvq_rr_en_q17.neutral: It is important to them to have ambitions in life.

pvq_rr_en_q18.male: It is important to him to maintain traditional values and ways of thinking.
pvq_rr_en_q18.female: It is important to her to maintain traditional values and ways of thinking.
pvq_rr_en_q18.neutral: It is important to them to maintain traditional values and ways of thinking.

pvq_rr_en_q19.male: It is important to him that people he knows have full confidence in him.
pvq_rr_en_q19.female: It is important to her that people she knows have full confidence in her.
pvq_rr_en_q19.neutral: It is important to them that people they know have full confidence in them.

pvq_rr_en_attention_01.male: This is an attention check. Please select 'Not like me at all' to show you are reading carefully.
pvq_rr_en_attention_01.female: This is an attention check. Please select 'Not like me at all' to show you are reading carefully.
pvq_rr_en_attention_01.neutral: This is an attention check. Please select 'Not like me at all' to show you are reading carefully.

pvq_rr_en_q20.male: It is important to him to be wealthy.
pvq_rr_en_q20.female: It is important to her to be wealthy.
pvq_rr_en_q20.neutral: It is important to them to be wealthy.

pvq_rr_en_q21.male: It is important to him to take part in activities to defend nature.
pvq_rr_en_q21.female: It is important to her to take part in activities to defend nature.
pvq_rr_en_q21.neutral: It is important to them to take part in activities to defend nature.

pvq_rr_en_q22.male: It is important to him never to annoy anyone.
pvq_rr_en_q22.female: It is important to her never to annoy anyone.
pvq_rr_en_q22.neutral: It is important to them never to annoy anyone.

pvq_rr_en_q23.male: It is important to him to develop his own opinions.
pvq_rr_en_q23.female: It is important to her to develop her own opinions.
pvq_rr_en_q23.neutral: It is important to them to develop their own opinions.

pvq_rr_en_q24.male: It is important to him to protect his public image.
pvq_rr_en_q24.female: It is important to her to protect her public image.
pvq_rr_en_q24.neutral: It is important to them to protect their public image.

pvq_rr_en_q25.male: It is very important to him to help the people dear to him.
pvq_rr_en_q25.female: It is very important to her to help the people dear to her.
pvq_rr_en_q25.neutral: It is very important to them to help the people dear to them.

pvq_rr_en_q26.male: It is important to him to be personally safe and secure.
pvq_rr_en_q26.female: It is important to her to be personally safe and secure.
pvq_rr_en_q26.neutral: It is important to them to be personally safe and secure.

pvq_rr_en_q27.male: It is important to him to be a dependable and trustworthy friend.
pvq_rr_en_q27.female: It is important to her to be a dependable and trustworthy friend.
pvq_rr_en_q27.neutral: It is important to them to be a dependable and trustworthy friend.

pvq_rr_en_q28.male: It is important to him to take risks that make life exciting.
pvq_rr_en_q28.female: It is important to her to take risks that make life exciting.
pvq_rr_en_q28.neutral: It is important to them to take risks that make life exciting.

pvq_rr_en_q29.male: It is important to him to have the power to make people do what he wants.
pvq_rr_en_q29.female: It is important to her to have the power to make people do what she wants.
pvq_rr_en_q29.neutral: It is important to them to have the power to make people do what they want.

pvq_rr_en_q30.male: It is important to him to plan his activities independently.
pvq_rr_en_q30.female: It is important to her to plan her activities independently.
pvq_rr_en_q30.neutral: It is important to them to plan their activities independently.

pvq_rr_en_q31.male: It is important to him to follow rules even when no-one is watching.
pvq_rr_en_q31.female: It is important to her to follow rules even when no-one is watching.
pvq_rr_en_q31.neutral: It is important to them to follow rules even when no-one is watching.

pvq_rr_en_q32.male: It is important to him to be very successful.
pvq_rr_en_q32.female: It is important to her to be very successful.
pvq_rr_en_q32.neutral: It is important to them to be very successful.

pvq_rr_en_q33.male: It is important to him to follow his family's customs or the customs of a religion.
pvq_rr_en_q33.female: It is important to her to follow her family's customs or the customs of a religion.
pvq_rr_en_q33.neutral: It is important to them to follow their family's customs or the customs of a religion.

pvq_rr_en_q34.male: It is important to him to listen to and understand people who are different from him.
pvq_rr_en_q34.female: It is important to her to listen to and understand people who are different from her.
pvq_rr_en_q34.neutral: It is important to them to listen to and understand people who are different from them.

pvq_rr_en_q35.male: It is important to him to have a strong state that can defend its citizens.
pvq_rr_en_q35.female: It is important to her to have a strong state that can defend its citizens.
pvq_rr_en_q35.neutral: It is important to them to have a strong state that can defend its citizens.

pvq_rr_en_q36.male: It is important to him to enjoy life's pleasures.
pvq_rr_en_q36.female: It is important to her to enjoy life's pleasures.
pvq_rr_en_q36.neutral: It is important to them to enjoy life's pleasures.

pvq_rr_en_q37.male: It is important to him that every person in the world have equal opportunities in life.
pvq_rr_en_q37.female: It is important to her that every person in the world have equal opportunities in life.
pvq_rr_en_q37.neutral: It is important to them that every person in the world have equal opportunities in life.

pvq_rr_en_q38.male: It is important to him to be humble.
pvq_rr_en_q38.female: It is important to her to be humble.
pvq_rr_en_q38.neutral: It is important to them to be humble.

pvq_rr_en_attention_02.female: This is an attention check. Please select 'Very much like me' to confirm you are paying attention.
pvq_rr_en_attention_02.neutral: This is an attention check. Please select 'Very much like me' to confirm you are paying attention.

pvq_rr_en_q39.male: It is important to him to figure things out himself.
pvq_rr_en_q39.female: It is important to her to figure things out herself.
pvq_rr_en_q39.neutral: It is important to them to figure things out themselves.

pvq_rr_en_q40.female: It is important to her to honor the traditional practices of her culture.
pvq_rr_en_q40.neutral: It is important to them to honor the traditional practices of their culture.

pvq_rr_en_q41.male: It is important to him to be the one who tells others what to do.
pvq_rr_en_q41.female: It is important to her to be the one who tells others what to do.
pvq_rr_en_q41.neutral: It is important to them to be the one who tells others what to do.

pvq_rr_en_q42.male: It is important to him to obey all the laws.
pvq_rr_en_q42.female: It is important to her to obey all the laws.
pvq_rr_en_q42.neutral: It is important to them to obey all the laws.

pvq_rr_en_q43.male: It is important to him to have all sorts of new experiences.
pvq_rr_en_q43.female: It is important to her to have all sorts of new experiences.
pvq_rr_en_q43.neutral: It is important to them to have all sorts of new experiences.

pvq_rr_en_q44.male: It is important to him to own expensive things that show his wealth
pvq_rr_en_q44.female: It is important to her to own expensive things that show her wealth
pvq_rr_en_q44.neutral: It is important to them to own expensive things that show their wealth

pvq_rr_en_q45.male: It is important to him to protect the natural environment from destruction or polution.
pvq_rr_en_q45.female: It is important to her to protect the natural environment from destruction or pollution.
pvq_rr_en_q45.neutral: It is important to them to protect the natural environment from destruction or pollution.

pvq_rr_en_q46.male: It is important to him to take advantage of every opportunity to have fun.
pvq_rr_en_q46.female: It is important to her to take advantage of every opportunity to have fun.
pvq_rr_en_q46.neutral: It is important to them to take advantage of every opportunity to have fun.

pvq_rr_en_q47.male: It is important to him to concern himself with every need of his dear ones.
pvq_rr_en_q47.female: It is important to her to concern herself with every need of her dear ones.
pvq_rr_en_q47.neutral: It is important to them to concern themselves with every need of their dear ones.

pvq_rr_en_q48.male: It is important to him that people recognize what he achieves.
pvq_rr_en_q48.female: It is important to her that people recognize what she achieves.
pvq_rr_en_q48.neutral: It is important to them that people recognize what they achieve.

pvq_rr_en_q49.male: It is important to him never to be humiliated.
pvq_rr_en_q49.female: It is important to her never to be humiliated.
pvq_rr_en_q49.neutral: It is important to them never to be humiliated.

pvq_rr_en_q50.male: It is important to him that his country protect itself against all threats.
pvq_rr_en_q50.female: It is important to her that her country protect itself against all threats.
pvq_rr_en_q50.neutral: It is important to them that their country protect itself against all threats.

pvq_rr_en_q51.male: It is important to him never to make other people angry.
pvq_rr_en_q51.female: It is important to her never to make other people angry.
pvq_rr_en_q51.neutral: It is important to them never to make other people angry.

pvq_rr_en_q52.male: It is important to him that everyone be treated justly, even people he doesn't know.
pvq_rr_en_q52.female: It is important to her that everyone be treated justly, even people she doesn't know.
pvq_rr_en_q52.neutral: It is important to them that everyone be treated justly, even people they don't know.

pvq_rr_en_q53.male: It is important to him to avoid anything dangerous.
pvq_rr_en_q53.female: It is important to her to avoid anything dangerous.
pvq_rr_en_q53.neutral: It is important to them to avoid anything dangerous.

pvq_rr_en_q54.male: It is important to him to be satisfied with what he has and not ask for more.
pvq_rr_en_q54.female: It is important to her to be satisfied with what she has and not ask for more.
pvq_rr_en_q54.neutral: It is important to them to be satisfied with what they have and not ask for more.

pvq_rr_en_q55.male: It is important to him that all his friends and family can rely on him completely.
pvq_rr_en_q55.female: It is important to her that all her friends and family can rely on her completely.
pvq_rr_en_q55.neutral: It is important to them that all their friends and family can rely on them completely.

pvq_rr_en_q56.male: It is important to him to be free to choose what he does by himself.
pvq_rr_en_q56.female: It is important to her to be free to choose what she does by herself.
pvq_rr_en_q56.neutral: It is important to them to be free to choose what they do by themselves.

pvq_rr_en_q57.male: It is important to him to accept people even when he disagrees with them.
pvq_rr_en_q57.female: It is important to her to accept people even when she disagrees with them.
pvq_rr_en_q57.neutral: It is important to them to accept people even when they disagree with them.
